Versions

How do I compare different versions on a content item?

Comparing two versions of the same content allows you to see the differences between them. You can compare any two versions of the same content. To compare versions: Open the...

How does content versioning work?

Content versions help you to keep track of what changes were made to your content and when they were made. Versions can be viewed, compared with and reverted to in...

How do I revert my content to a previous versions?

You can revert your content to a previous version. Reverting returns the content body and content type attributes to those in the selected version. Only admins can revert content to...

How do I view the versions of my content?

Any team member is able to view past versions of their content. To view a past version: Open the content item you want to view. Click on the Versions tab...
